credentials.title: Login
credentials.signupBtn: I don't have an account - I want to sign up

verificationCode.title: Please verify your identity
verificationCode.info: Please enter the six digit verification code we have sent to your email address. If you cannot find it in your inbox please also check the "spam" folder or request a new code with the button below.

errors.accountOrPassword: Something went wrong. Please double-check your email address and password.
errors.wrongCode: Wrong code. Please double-check the verification code we have sent you.
errors.newCodeSent: Wrong code. We have sent you a new code.
errors.rateLimit: Please be patient. You will be able to request a new code shortly.
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please double-check the information you have entered or try again later.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.loginLink: I already have an account, I want to log in
signup.reCaptchaLinks: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google <1>Privacy Policy</1> and <3>Terms of Service</3> apply.

errors.emailRules: The email address you entered is not valid.
errors.passwordRules: Your password must have at least 8 characters and contain 3 of the following 4 elements: lowercase letters, capital letters, numbers, punctuation marks.
errors.passwordMatch: The passwords you have entered do not match
errors.invalidEmail: Your email address seems to be incorrect

signupSuccess.title: Welcome!
signupSuccess.successMsg:
Your registration for Grippenet is almost complete! 

 Please confirm your email address by clicking on the link in the confirmation email that we have sent you 
 If you can’t find the email, please also check your "spam" folder or request a new email below.
signupSuccess.msgForVerifiedAccount: If you have just verified your account, you can use the button below to reload this page.
signupSuccess.wrongEmailBtn: Did you use the wrong email address? You can change it here.

errors.verifyEmailFirst: Please verify your email address first by following the link sent to you in your registration email. If you cannot find the email, please request a new email with the button above.

passwordForgotten.title: Change password
passwordForgotten.info: Please enter the email address of your account
passwordForgotten.successMessage:
Please follow the link in the email we have sent you.
 If you haven’t received an email please also check your "spam" folder or try again.

errors.invalidId: Something went wrong. Double-check your email address and make sure you are connected./n You can try again when the button below is visible.
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please double-check the information you have entered or try again later.

changeEmail.title: Change email address
changeEmail.info: Do you want to use a different email address? Change your email address by clicking on the button below. Note: you cannot log back into Grippenet until you have confirmed your new email address.

errors.wrongPasswordOrAccountId: Something went wrong. Please double-check the information you have entered (email address and/or password may be wrong).
errors.wrongEmailFormat: This is not a valid email address.
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please double-check the information you have entered or try again later.

warningDialog.title: Please confirm your new email address
warningDialog.content: Note: you cannot log back into Grippenet until you have confirmed the new email address via the link in the confirmation email that we have sent you.

successDialog.title: Email address successfully changed
successDialog.content: Success! Your email address has been changed.

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.info: For security reasons, you must first provide your current password.

errors.passwordRules: Your password must have at least 8 characters and contain 3 of the following 4 elements: lowercase letters, capital letters, numbers, punctuation marks.
errors.passwordMatch: The passwords you've entered do not match
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please double-check the information you have entered or try again later.

successDialog.title: Password changed
successDialog.content: Success! Your password has been changed.

manageProfiles.title: Profiles
manageProfiles.newProfileBtn: Create new profile for your child

warningDialog.title: Delete profile
warningDialog.content: The removal of the profile {{ alias }} cannot be undone.

new.title: New Profile
new.submitBtn: Create new profile for your child

editProfile.consentCheckboxText: You may only create a profile and complete questionnaires for yourself or as a parent/legal guardian of your child (who has not yet reached the age of 18).

changeLanguage.title: Languages
changeLanguage.info: You can change the default language here. If available, emails will also be sent in this language.

errors.emtyLanguages: Failed to load languages. Please try again later.
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please double-check the information you have entered or try again later.

successDialog.title: Language changed
successDialog.content: Success! The default language has been changed.

changeNotifications.title: Email settings
changeNotifications.info: You can choose whether you want to receive the weekly reminder email and/or the newsletter.

weeklyReminder.label: Weekly reminder email
weeklyReminder.on: I do want to receive the weekly reminder email
weeklyReminder.off: I don't want to receive the weekly reminder email

newsletter.label: Email to all participants. Sometimes it will be necessary to send an email to all participants of Grippenet containing information about the study.
newsletter.on: I do want to receive these emails which are sent to all participants
newsletter.off: I don’t want to receive these emails which are sent to all participants

successDialog.title: Settings have been successfully changed
successDialog.content: Success! Your email settings have been changed.

deleteAccount.title: Withdraw from study
deleteAccount.info:
Are you sure you want to delete your account? 
 This action cannot be undone.

successDialog.title: Account deleted
successDialog.content: Success! Your account has been successfully deleted. Thank you for your contribution. You can always participate again by creating a new account.
